subject: Basketball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Thibodeau was 255-139 with the Bulls, good for a .647 winning percentage, which puts him seventh in N.B.A. history among coaches with at least 200 games.
snippet: Thibodeau was 255-139 with the Bulls, good for a .647 winning percentage, which puts him seventh in N.B.A. history among coaches with at least 200 games.
